name: 唯唯
lyrics:
词 : 艾志恒Asen
曲 : 艾志恒Asen
编曲 : Bokoven Beats
混音 : 谭玉堂
母带 : 张步若
No need to cry
窗外也在下雨
打开简讯又是
"你在哪里？"
我在哪儿其实不重要
Like I told you we won't work out
No need to cry you just want my body
My body
Then I tell you all these lies
你知道后也不会多意外
根本不需要去猜
Cuz I really don't like you
I really don't like you
我讨厌你在我面前装酷
我讨厌每次接你电话都听你诉苦
但现在我终于解脱
But I don't know
Don't know where to go
等你松手
不知道往哪儿走
I should go back to my home
But I don't have one
只有你能满足我的要求
这是最后一次跟你联络
你我清楚不需要再点破
这场戏我俩也算是演过
No need to cry
窗外也在下雨
打开简讯又是
"你在哪里？"
我在哪儿其实不重要
Like I told you we won't work out
But maybe I want you
Maybe I need you
No I can't lose you
Cuz maybe I want you
Just you
You are the only one
You are the only one
Cuz maybe I want you
Maybe I need you
No I can't lose you
Cuz maybe I want you
Just you
You are the only one
You are the only one
No need to cry
窗外也在下雨
打开简讯又是:"你在哪里？"
我在哪儿其实不重要
Like I told you we won't work out
No need to …
Cuz maybe I want you
Maybe I need you
No I can't lose you
Cuz maybe I want you
Just you
You are the only one
You are the only one

收起
